docs.snippet: The Fall 2012 European men's shows are underway at Pitti Uomo, where a number of noteworthy items have already made multiple appearances....
docs.abstract: The Fall 2012 European men's shows are underway at Pitti Uomo, where a number of noteworthy items have already made multiple appearances.
docs.lead_paragraph: The Fall 2012 European men's shows are underway here in Florence at Pitti Uomo, where a number of noteworthy items have already made multiple appearances. The metallic cap toe was first spotted on both a lace-up oxford and a boot at Grenson, a design leader in the very traditional world of English shoemaking. It's a slightly subversive, chic formal shoe for a daring guy, and also a denim-friendly basic with some extra kick.

headline.main: On Our Radar: A Fracking Confrontation in Ohio

docs.snippet: Residents of Youngstown express disappointment after state officials decline to link 11 earthquakes to fracking for a deep-injection gas well....
docs.abstract: Residents of Youngstown express disappointment after state officials decline to link 11 earthquakes to fracking for a deep-injection gas well.

headline.main: On Our Radar: A Fracking Confrontation in Ohio

docs.snippet: Residents of Youngstown express disappointment after state officials decline to link 11 earthquakes to fracking for a deep-injection gas well....
docs.abstract: Residents of Youngstown express disappointment after state officials decline to link 11 earthquakes to fracking for a deep-injection gas well.
docs.lead_paragraph: A crowd jeers at Ohio environmental officials as they take questions at a public forum about the relationship between fracking for a deep-injection well in Youngstown and 11 recent earthquakes there. A geologist told the audience that he did not believe the gas drilling caused the earthquakes. [Business Journal Daily]

headline.main: Dead Voters in South Carolina? Maybe. Maybe Not.

docs.snippet: We don't need to worry about voter fraud. We do need to worry about voter ID laws....
docs.abstract: We don't need to worry about voter fraud. We do need to worry about voter ID laws.

headline.main: Dead Voters in South Carolina? Maybe. Maybe Not.

docs.snippet: We don't need to worry about voter fraud. We do need to worry about voter ID laws....
docs.abstract: We don't need to worry about voter fraud. We do need to worry about voter ID laws.
docs.lead_paragraph: Some readers have been calling my attention to a new report stating that the Department of Motor Vehicles in South Carolina found over 900 votes recorded in "recent elections" from dead people. These comments are intended, sometimes in a well-meaning way and sometimes not, to show me that what I've written about voter fraud and voter ID laws is wrong.

docs.snippet: Though there was a 12 percent decrease in bankruptcies, the decline doesn’t necessarily reflect an improvement in the economy....
docs.abstract: Though there was a 12 percent decrease in bankruptcies, the decline doesn’t necessarily reflect an improvement in the economy.

docs.snippet: Bankruptcies declined nearly 12 percent in the United States in 2011 from a year earlier....
docs.abstract: Bankruptcies declined nearly 12 percent in the United States in 2011 from a year earlier.
docs.lead_paragraph: Bankruptcy filings fell nearly 12 percent in 2011 from the year before, according to statistics from Epiq Systems, which tracks the data.
